item.title: Bar Plots
item.description: This type of data visualiztion is my personal favorite. I hope you like learning about it too! Letâ€™s make sure to install the proper pakages. library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) This example will look at the team homerun totals for all the MLB teams in 1980. query<-"SELECT name,HR FROM Teams WHERE yearID=1980 ORDER BY HR " result<-sqldf(query) result$name<-factor(result$name,levels=result$name) It is important to let the system know how the data should appear in, by saving the command as factor.
